# Yeoman Doctor [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/yeoman/doctor.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/yeoman/doctor)



## Usage

Use as part of yo

```
yo doctor
```

If installed globally on your machine, you can also call `yodoctor`
